ValidationRule.description: Contact Method is required for Closed Won
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(CONTAINS(Text( Contact_method__c ),"Unknown"),ISBLANK(TEXT(Contact_method__c )), IsWon, $Profile.Name <>"System Administrator", NOT(contains( $Profile.Name, "Customer Success Manager")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure the Contact Method is not unknown or blank. If this lead was invited, please find the previous Lead Source or ask the prospect directly.
